segments.text: I'd like to have a look at your air conditioners . Hum , this one looks pretty good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it ’ s this summer ’ s best-seller .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And what about your customer service ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We provide free delivery and installation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is two-year and covers parts and service .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very good . I ’ ll take it .
segments.speaker: S2
